div.p: SCOPARIA, in botany: A genus of the nſonogynia order, belonging to the tetrandria claſs of plants; and in the natural method ranking under the 40th order, Personatae. The calyx is quadripartite; the corolla the ſame, and rotaceous; the capſule unilocular, bivalved, and polyſpermous.
